channel.title: 游戏翻译 on Ligen的笔记
channel.description: Recent content in 游戏翻译 on Ligen的笔记

item.title: Dota常用术语翻译
item.description: 面伤”aoe” - area if effect; the radius of a certain area. 魔瓶”bottle” - to seal a rune into the item, Bottle. 素质 “bg” - bad game; game was not fun. If a player states bg in the middle of a game, they are either being sarcastic or gave up on the hopes of winning. 后期”carry” - A hero that has the capability of wiping out the enemy team and winning the game.
